summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Local Improvement District No. 6750; authorizing and providing for the issuance and sale of local improvement district bonds to pay part of the cost of financing elements of Local Improvement District No. 6750, and all of the costs of issuing and selling the bonds; providing for terms and sale of the bonds; and providing for the method of fixing the interest rate on assessments in Local Improvement District No. 6750.
